alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant; Richland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:50AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Grant, Richland and northeastern Crawford Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1249 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Boscobel to Asbury. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Richland Center and Cuba City around 110 AM CDT. Platteville around 115 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Arthur, Highway 61 And County T, Montfort, Horrigan Ridge, Eagle Corners, Woodstock, Gillingham, County Roads K And T, Neptune and Buck Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southwestern Wisconsin.
